Job Description:
Requirements for eligibility:  

•  B.E/ B.Tech/ M.Sc in the field of Electronics & Communications OR Electrical & Electronics with good academics.
•  4 years of core experience in the field of embedded systems design and programming.
•  Be fully responsible for projects from specification to completion,  guiding junior engineers & be responsible for the completion of every project in a timely manner.
•  Handle multiple projects concurrently executed by different teams.
•  Must be exceptionally good in C programming,  testing/ debugging and in advanced C concepts  (pointers,  structures,  unions,  interrupts etc) .
•  Must have completed a good number of microcontroller based projects.
•  Good knowledge of using tools like C cross compilers for microcontrollers.
•  Handle both big & small projects within deadlines & able to work independently or in a group.
